meanings.definition: In a manner that is permissible or acceptable.
meanings.sent1: She spoke allowably during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He completed the task allowably and on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed allowably at the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed allowably in the spring sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The children played allowably in the playground.

meanings.definition: In a way that is within the bounds of what is allowed or permitted.
meanings.sent1: The student answered the exam questions allowably.
meanings.sent2: The team followed the rules allowably throughout the game.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail allowably when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed allowably through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The car drove allowably within the speed limit.
